review_data.title: Wollishoffen location
review_data.content: We cant speak for the Forch location, but the Wollishoffen location has decent pizza for a great price. Was SHOCKED walking into pickup, after all the home deliveries, to see masks slid under their chins, the cashier only put it on when I entered. Chef...More

review_data.title: Great pizza
review_data.content: It was great pizza and nice atmosphere in restaurant. Price is ok for what you get. You got your order very fast.

review_data.title: Sehr feine Pizza / Gute Preise

review_data.title: Beste Pizza in Zürich
review_data.content: Machen einfach die beste Pizza in Zürich. Sensationeller Teig! Auch bei Heimlieferung immer top Qualität.

review_data.title: Cozy place with a good pizza
review_data.content: Living nearby, I decided to give it a try. Since order for delivery is not my favourite way, I stepped in to eat a pizza onsite. The guys are very kind, Pizza ist good (I had Prosciutto e funghi), you can go to the fridge...More

review_data.title: Lieblingspizzas
review_data.content: Das Spizzati wird von Italienern betrieben, die richtig feine Pizzas machen. Der Pizzaboden ist sensationell fein.
